name: Jotaro Kujo Simulator [Released]
description:
HTML file not EXE or DMG

The real Kujo [Jotaro Part 3] B-Summon Dummy 

 Q - Stand Summon M - Mature (Requires Stand Off) [Prime Star Platinum] E - Ora Barrage (3.25s CD) R - Ora Punch (4s CD) T - Star Finger (4.75s CD) Y - Ora Kicks (3.75s CD) F - Cyclonic Inhale (12.5s CD) G - Kakyoin Beatdown (30s CD) H - Skull Breaker. (9.5s CD) J - Rage Mode (25s CD, lasts 15s.) Z - Rock Throw (4.75s CD) X - Stand Jump (6s CD) (Rage Mode) X - Teleport (4s CD) G - Steely Dan Beatdown (45s CD) F - Star Platinum, The World. (40s CD. 5 Second Time Stop. Can be ended early, ends Rage Mode.) G - (During Time Stop) Leg Breaker (8s CD) [Star Platinum: The World] E - Ora Barrage (3.25s CD) R - Ora Punch (4s CD) T - Ground Slam (4.75s CD) Y - Ora Rush (3.75s CD, extends TS until it ends.) F - Star Platinum, Unleash The World! (5s CD, stops time for 3 seconds.) G - Kira Beatdown (30s CD) H - Wrist Breaker (5.75s CD) J - Precision Mode (25s CD, lasts 15 seconds) Z - Bearing Shot (4.75s CD, can be held down to delay firing.) X - Time Stop Teleport [Precision Mode] G - Kawajiri Beatdown [Star Platinum: The World (Stone Ocean)] E - Ora Barrage (3.25s CD) R - Ora Punch (4s CD) T - Ground Slam (4.75s CD) Y - Ora Rush (3.75s CD, doesn't extend TS) F - Star Platinum, Unleash The World! (5s CD, stops time for 5 seconds.) G - Time Stop Beatdown (30s CD) H - Pipe Combustion (8.5s CD) J - Precision Mode (25s CD, lasts 15 seconds) Z - Spear Throw (4.75s CD) X - Time Stop Teleport
